00034 /* Utilities */
00035 
00036 bool BlenderSync::object_is_modified(BL::Object b_ob)
00037 {
00038     /* test if we can instance or if the object is modified */
00039     if(ccl::object_is_modified(b_ob, b_scene, preview)) {
00040         /* modifiers */
00041         return true;
00042     }
00043     else {
00044         /* object level material links */
00045         BL::Object::material_slots_iterator slot;
00046         for(b_ob.material_slots.begin(slot); slot != b_ob.material_slots.end(); ++slot)
00047             if(slot->link() == BL::MaterialSlot::link_OBJECT)
00048                 return true;
00049     }
00050 
00051     return false;
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool BlenderSync::object_is_mesh(BL::Object b_ob)
00055 {
00056     BL::ID b_ob_data = b_ob.data();
00057 
00058     return (b_ob_data && (b_ob_data.is_a(&RNA_Mesh) ||
00059         b_ob_data.is_a(&RNA_Curve) || b_ob_data.is_a(&RNA_MetaBall)));
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool BlenderSync::object_is_light(BL::Object b_ob)
00063 {
00064     BL::ID b_ob_data = b_ob.data();
00065 
00066     return (b_ob_data && b_ob_data.is_a(&RNA_Lamp));
00067 }
00068 
00069 static uint object_ray_visibility(BL::Object b_ob)
00070 {
00071     PointerRNA cvisibility = RNA_pointer_get(&b_ob.ptr, "cycles_visibility");
00072     uint flag = 0;
00073 
00074     flag |= get_boolean(cvisibility, "camera")? PATH_RAY_CAMERA: 0;
00075     flag |= get_boolean(cvisibility, "diffuse")? PATH_RAY_DIFFUSE: 0;
00076     flag |= get_boolean(cvisibility, "glossy")? PATH_RAY_GLOSSY: 0;
00077     flag |= get_boolean(cvisibility, "transmission")? PATH_RAY_TRANSMIT: 0;
00078     flag |= get_boolean(cvisibility, "shadow")? PATH_RAY_SHADOW: 0;
00079 
00080     return flag;
00081 }
00082 
00083 /* Light */
00084 
00085 void BlenderSync::sync_light(BL::Object b_parent, int b_index, BL::Object b_ob, Transform& tfm)
00086 {
00087     /* test if we need to sync */
00088     Light *light;
00089     ObjectKey key(b_parent, b_index, b_ob);
00090 
00091     if(!light_map.sync(&light, b_ob, b_parent, key))
00092         return;
00093     
00094     BL::Lamp b_lamp(b_ob.data());
00095 
00096     /* type */
00097     switch(b_lamp.type()) {
00098         case BL::Lamp::type_POINT: {
00099             BL::PointLamp b_point_lamp(b_lamp);
00100             light->size = b_point_lamp.shadow_soft_size();
00101             light->type = LIGHT_POINT;
00102             break;
00103         }
00104         case BL::Lamp::type_SPOT: {
00105             BL::SpotLamp b_spot_lamp(b_lamp);
00106             light->size = b_spot_lamp.shadow_soft_size();
00107             light->type = LIGHT_POINT;
00108             break;
00109         }
00110         case BL::Lamp::type_HEMI: {
00111             light->type = LIGHT_DISTANT;
00112             light->size = 0.0f;
00113             break;
00114         }
00115         case BL::Lamp::type_SUN: {
00116             BL::SunLamp b_sun_lamp(b_lamp);
00117             light->size = b_sun_lamp.shadow_soft_size();
00118             light->type = LIGHT_DISTANT;
00119             break;
00120         }
00121         case BL::Lamp::type_AREA: {
00122             BL::AreaLamp b_area_lamp(b_lamp);
00123             light->size = 1.0f;
00124             light->axisu = make_float3(tfm.x.x, tfm.y.x, tfm.z.x);
00125             light->axisv = make_float3(tfm.x.y, tfm.y.y, tfm.z.y);
00126             light->sizeu = b_area_lamp.size();
00127             if(b_area_lamp.shape() == BL::AreaLamp::shape_RECTANGLE)
00128                 light->sizev = b_area_lamp.size_y();
00129             else
00130                 light->sizev = light->sizeu;
00131             light->type = LIGHT_AREA;
00132             break;
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     /* location and (inverted!) direction */
00137     light->co = make_float3(tfm.x.w, tfm.y.w, tfm.z.w);
00138     light->dir = -make_float3(tfm.x.z, tfm.y.z, tfm.z.z);
00139 
00140     /* shader */
00141     vector<uint> used_shaders;
00142 
00143     find_shader(b_lamp, used_shaders, scene->default_light);
00144 
00145     if(used_shaders.size() == 0)
00146         used_shaders.push_back(scene->default_light);
00147 
00148     light->shader = used_shaders[0];
00149 
00150     /* shadow */
00151     PointerRNA clamp = RNA_pointer_get(&b_lamp.ptr, "cycles");
00152     light->cast_shadow = get_boolean(clamp, "cast_shadow");
00153 
00154     /* tag */
00155     light->tag_update(scene);
00156 }
00157 
00158 void BlenderSync::sync_background_light()
00159 {
00160     BL::World b_world = b_scene.world();
00161 
00162     if(b_world) {
00163         PointerRNA cworld = RNA_pointer_get(&b_world.ptr, "cycles");
00164         bool sample_as_light = get_boolean(cworld, "sample_as_light");
00165 
00166         if(sample_as_light) {
00167             /* test if we need to sync */
00168             Light *light;
00169             ObjectKey key(b_world, 0, b_world);
00170 
00171             if(light_map.sync(&light, b_world, b_world, key) ||
00172                world_recalc ||
00173                b_world.ptr.data != world_map)
00174             {
00175                 light->type = LIGHT_BACKGROUND;
00176                 light->map_resolution  = get_int(cworld, "sample_map_resolution");
00177                 light->shader = scene->default_background;
00178 
00179                 light->tag_update(scene);
00180                 light_map.set_recalc(b_world);
00181             }
00182         }
00183     }
00184 
00185     world_map = b_world.ptr.data;
00186     world_recalc = false;
00187 }
00188 
00189 /* Object */
00190 
00191 void BlenderSync::sync_object(BL::Object b_parent, int b_index, BL::Object b_ob, Transform& tfm, uint layer_flag)
00192 {
00193     /* light is handled separately */
00194     if(object_is_light(b_ob)) {
00195         sync_light(b_parent, b_index, b_ob, tfm);
00196         return;
00197     }
00198 
00199     /* only interested in object that we can create meshes from */
00200     if(!object_is_mesh(b_ob))
00201         return;
00202 
00203     /* test if we need to sync */
00204     ObjectKey key(b_parent, b_index, b_ob);
00205     Object *object;
00206     bool object_updated = false;
00207 
00208     if(object_map.sync(&object, b_ob, b_parent, key))
00209         object_updated = true;
00210     
00211     /* holdout? */
00212     bool holdout = (layer_flag & render_layer.holdout_layer) != 0;
00213 
00214     /* mesh sync */
00215     object->mesh = sync_mesh(b_ob, holdout, object_updated);
00216 
00217     /* object sync */
00218     if(object_updated || (object->mesh && object->mesh->need_update)) {
00219         object->name = b_ob.name().c_str();
00220         object->pass_id = b_ob.pass_index();
00221         object->tfm = tfm;
00222 
00223         /* visibility flags for both parent */
00224         object->visibility = object_ray_visibility(b_ob) & PATH_RAY_ALL;
00225         if(b_parent.ptr.data != b_ob.ptr.data)
00226             object->visibility &= object_ray_visibility(b_parent);
00227 
00228         /* camera flag is not actually used, instead is tested
00229            against render layer flags */
00230         if(object->visibility & PATH_RAY_CAMERA) {
00231             object->visibility |= layer_flag << PATH_RAY_LAYER_SHIFT;
00232             object->visibility &= ~PATH_RAY_CAMERA;
00233         }
00234 
00235         object->tag_update(scene);
00236     }
00237 }
00238 
00239 /* Object Loop */
00240 
00241 void BlenderSync::sync_objects(BL::SpaceView3D b_v3d)
00242 {
00243     /* layer data */
00244     uint scene_layer = render_layer.scene_layer;
00245     
00246     /* prepare for sync */
00247     light_map.pre_sync();
00248     mesh_map.pre_sync();
00249     object_map.pre_sync();
00250     mesh_synced.clear();
00251 
00252     /* object loop */
00253     BL::Scene::objects_iterator b_ob;
00254 
00255     for(b_scene.objects.begin(b_ob); b_ob != b_scene.objects.end(); ++b_ob) {
00256         bool hide = (b_v3d)? b_ob->hide(): b_ob->hide_render();
00257         uint ob_layer = get_layer(b_ob->layers());
00258 
00259         if(!hide && (ob_layer & scene_layer)) {
00260             if(b_ob->is_duplicator()) {
00261                 /* dupli objects */
00262                 object_create_duplilist(*b_ob, b_scene);
00263 
00264                 BL::Object::dupli_list_iterator b_dup;
00265                 int b_index = 0;
00266 
00267                 for(b_ob->dupli_list.begin(b_dup); b_dup != b_ob->dupli_list.end(); ++b_dup) {
00268                     Transform tfm = get_transform(b_dup->matrix());
00269                     BL::Object b_dup_ob = b_dup->object();
00270                     bool dup_hide = (b_v3d)? b_dup_ob.hide(): b_dup_ob.hide_render();
00271 
00272                     if(!(b_dup->hide() || dup_hide))
00273                         sync_object(*b_ob, b_index, b_dup_ob, tfm, ob_layer);
00274 
00275                     b_index++;
00276                 }
00277 
00278                 object_free_duplilist(*b_ob);
00279 
00280                 hide = true;
00281             }
00282 
00283             /* check if we should render or hide particle emitter */
00284             BL::Object::particle_systems_iterator b_psys;
00285             bool render_emitter = false;
00286 
00287             for(b_ob->particle_systems.begin(b_psys); b_psys != b_ob->particle_systems.end(); ++b_psys) {
00288                 if(b_psys->settings().use_render_emitter()) {
00289                     hide = false;
00290                     render_emitter = true;
00291                 }
00292                 else if(!render_emitter)
00293                     hide = true;
00294             }
00295 
00296             if(!hide) {
00297                 /* object itself */
00298                 Transform tfm = get_transform(b_ob->matrix_world());
00299                 sync_object(*b_ob, 0, *b_ob, tfm, ob_layer);
00300             }
00301         }
00302     }
00303 
00304     sync_background_light();
00305 
00306     /* handle removed data and modified pointers */
00307     if(light_map.post_sync())
00308         scene->light_manager->tag_update(scene);
00309     if(mesh_map.post_sync())
00310         scene->mesh_manager->tag_update(scene);
00311     if(object_map.post_sync())
00312         scene->object_manager->tag_update(scene);
00313     mesh_synced.clear();
00314 }
